nodes.bodyText: Please extract the common API path to constant. It will change in the future.

you build a response here but then do nothing with it.
From JAX-RS specification

3.3.3 Return Type
void Results in an empty entity body with a 204 status code.

So Having just empty method will do the works.
How can this work? You build a repsoinse but then don't use it anywhere.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
       <!-- Properties for Hibernate -->
       <property name="hibernate.dialect" value="org.hibernate.dialect.HSQLDialect"/>
       <property name="hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto" value="create-drop"/>
-      <property name="hibernate.show_sql" value="true"/>
+      <property name="hibernate.show_sql" value="false"/>

nodes.bodyText: This was set to true by me some days ago, I am just reverting it back
